headline: Synchrony Extends Long-Standing Partnership with American Eagle Outfitters, Inc.
summary: Synchrony (NYSE: SYF), a premier consumer financial services company, today announced a multi-year extension of its agreement to manage the credit programs of American Eagle Outfitters, Inc. (NYSE: AEO), a leading global specialty retailer. Synchrony will continue to deliver a frictionless consumer financing experience for American Eagle and Aerie customers to earn rewards when they use their Real Rewards credit card to shop online and in stores.
